chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:

I urgently need the invoice for purchasing the iPhone. Please send it as soon as possible. Thank you.

Thank you very much for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

Customer asked for the invoice.

Please provide us with the invoice in 48 hours.

 If not, you'll accept to charge a gesture equal to 20% of the order value, including VAT and excluding shipping costs, up to a maximum of €50.

Best regards,
Esra-Nur from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Attatched is the invoice of the customer's order.

Regards,
JH
